item.title: Allspice
item.description: Allspice # Overview # id allspice species Pimenta dioica (L.) Merr. family Myrtaceae Names #

item.title: Allspice
item.description: HOW TO: pandoc -s example4.tex -o example5.md Allspice # Overview # id allspice species Pimenta dioica (L.) Merr. family Myrtaceae Names # English allspice Arabic فلفل إفرنجي Chinese 多香果 Allspice # ::: note Introducing the Spice profile box. As it can be seen above in Spice profile [spice:allspice]{reference-type=“ref” reference=“spice:allspice”} presenting allspice, this business-card-like environment gives a quick reference of the spice under scrutiny in a concise way. This is intended to be a convenience for the reader to return and glance back at brief, factual information about a particular item whenever necessary.
